feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature request to replace a specific image in WhoWeAreSection.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing summarized descriptions of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base, components, and utilities imports.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting up root div and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines TanStack Router routes and renders the router provider.
frontend/src/components/branding/UtthanL: Simple logo component rendering the clinic's SVG logo.
frontend/src/components/contact/GoogleMa: Google Maps iframe embed component wrapped in a styled container.
frontend/src/components/cta/BookAppointm: Button linking to the clinic's Calendly URL with calendar icon.
Reusable email button generating a mailto link with optional subject/body.
frontend/src/components/cta/MobileSticky: Mobile‑only sticky booking bar linking to Calendly.
frontend/src/components/home/PrideMoment: Section displaying pride‑moment photos with captions in a grid.
frontend/src/components/home/WhoWeAreSec: Two‑column section with dr-banner.jpg image and clinic introduction text plus CTA.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with about text, quick links, services list, and contact info.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header navigation with logo, links, mobile menu, and booking button.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Root layout wrapping header, main content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: React component that sets page title, meta description, and optional JSON-LD in the document head with cleanup on unmount.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Displays a service card with image fallback, icon, summary info, benefits preview, and a link to the service page.
Maps service IDs to lucide-react icons and renders the corresponding icon with optional sizing classes.
frontend/src/content/clinicContent.ts: Static clinic content including hero text, about section, values, story, and reasons to choose the clinic.
frontend/src/content/conditions.ts: Defines condition data with symptoms and treatments for various physiotherapy-related issues.
frontend/src/content/faq.ts: Provides a list of FAQs with questions and detailed answers for patients.
frontend/src/content/prideMoments.ts: Static content describing clinic pride moments with photo metadata and captions.
frontend/src/content/reviews.ts: Contains Google rating data, detailed patient reviews, and helper functions for averaging and counting reviews.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Defines service metadata including descriptions, benefits, target audience, and images for physiotherapy offerings.
frontend/src/content/therapists.ts: Defines the Therapist interface and provides a list of therapist profiles with qualifications and bios.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines custom color variables, dark mode styles, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/clinicInfo.ts: Exports clinic contact details and helper functions to format the address and phone link.
frontend/src/lib/seoSchema.ts: Generates JSON-LD schema objects for local business, services, FAQs, and reviews using clinic data.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function to merge Tailwind CSS class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with hero content, clinic story, mission, vision, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ConditionsPage.tsx: Displays a list of treatable conditions with symptoms and treatments, along with page-level SEO.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with phone, email, location details, and a map embed, using cards and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Displays a FAQ page with an accordion of questions and answers and includes structured FAQ SEO data.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the home page with a hero section, trust badges, service highlights, and SEO schema for the business.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a single service, including description, image, benefits, and structured SEO data.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists all physiotherapy services in a grid layout with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Renders a testimonials page displaying patient reviews with SEO review schema.
frontend/src/pages/TherapistsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for therapist content.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing and new feature requests, and configuration flags for the Utthan Clinic project.
